name: Soakmont
description: The Soakmont Group is a financial technology company focused on utilizing the transparency and efficiency of blockchain and Web3 across a range of industries and products. Soakmont ($SKMT) exists to disrupt and improve traditional industries, enabling corporations and users to realize a range of benefits. Soakmont will do this by taking the very best practice, insight, and knowledge from across a range of financial sectors and products and blending that with Soakmontâ€™s cutting edge Web3 and blockchain technologies. Where Soakmont stands out from the crowd is through the focus on regulatory compliance, providing users of all Soakmont products an unparalleled peace of mind. At all stages of product development Soakmont works to achieve and maintain the highest standards of legal and regulatory compliance, adhering to the principle that nothing beats transparency.
